verses.verse: A Prayer <WH8605> of David <WH1732>. Bow down <WH5186> thine ear <WH241>, O LORD <WH3068>, hear <WH6030> me: for I am poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>. A Prayer: or, A Prayer, being a Psalm of David
Preserve <WH8104> my soul <WH5315>; for I am holy <WH2623>: O thou my God <WH430>, save <WH3467> thy servant <WH5650> that trusteth <WH982> in thee. holy: or, one whom thou favourest
Be merciful <WH2603> unto me, O Lord <WH136>: for I cry <WH7121> unto thee daily <WH3117>. daily: or, all the day
Rejoice <WH8055> the soul <WH5315> of thy servant <WH5650>: for unto thee, O Lord <WH136>, do I lift up <WH5375> my soul <WH5315>.
For thou, Lord <WH136>, art good <WH2896>, and ready to forgive <WH5546>; and plenteous <WH7227> in mercy <WH2617> unto all them that call <WH7121> upon thee.
Give ear <WH238>, O LORD <WH3068>, unto my prayer <WH8605>; and attend <WH7181> to the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469>.
In the day <WH3117> of my trouble <WH6869> I will call <WH7121> upon thee: for thou wilt answer <WH6030> me.
Among the gods <WH430> there is none like unto thee, O Lord <WH136>; neither are there any works like unto thy works <WH4639>.
All nations <WH1471> whom thou hast made <WH6213> shall come <WH935> and worship <WH7812> before <WH6440> thee, O Lord <WH136>; and shall glorify <WH3513> thy name <WH8034>.
For thou art great <WH1419>, and doest <WH6213> wondrous things <WH6381>: thou art God <WH430> alone.
Teach <WH3384> me thy way <WH1870>, O LORD <WH3068>; I will walk <WH1980> in thy truth <WH571>: unite <WH3161> my heart <WH3824> to fear <WH3372> thy name <WH8034>.
I will praise <WH3034> thee, O Lord <WH136> my God <WH430>, with all my heart <WH3824>: and I will glorify <WH3513> thy name <WH8034> for evermore <WH5769>.
For great <WH1419> is thy mercy <WH2617> toward me: and thou hast delivered <WH5337> my soul <WH5315> from the lowest <WH8482> hell <WH7585>. hell: or, grave

O God <WH430>, the proud <WH2086> are risen <WH6965> against me, and the assemblies <WH5712> of violent <WH6184> men have sought <WH1245> after my soul <WH5315>; and have not set <WH7760> thee before them. violent: Heb. terrible
But thou, O Lord <WH136>, art a God <WH410> full of compassion <WH7349>, and gracious <WH2587>, longsuffering <WH750> <WH639>, and plenteous <WH7227> in mercy <WH2617> and truth <WH571>.
O turn <WH6437> unto me, and have mercy <WH2603> upon me; give <WH5414> thy strength <WH5797> unto thy servant <WH5650>, and save <WH3467> the son <WH1121> of thine handmaid <WH519>.

Shew <WH6213> me a token <WH226> for good <WH2896>; that they which hate <WH8130> me may see <WH7200> it, and be ashamed <WH954>: because thou, LORD <WH3068>, hast holpen <WH5826> me, and comforted <WH5162> me.
